Glenn, totally agree with the point, nice summary!
And about the last part,=
 any non-complaint component will affect the goals depending on what is the=
 constrain it is not adhering to, what component that is, how many relation=
ships it has with other components, etc. In other words, there are not abso=
lutes here, everything depends and it is the job of the architect to know h=
ow much impact one little change means.

Cheers!

William.

 In other words, client matters.

re clients behave correctly, and you don't control the

 of the server's job to

orce policies. There is far

 one client.

 a Server, with a

g its part, sounds like

we can expose a REST like

ing clients, may affect other

lled.

 repeating

st earning a
